short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gets the exchange rate for INR from USD using alphavantage api

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gets the exchange rate for Indian Rupee (INR) from United States Dollar (USD) using AlphaVantage api. Click on the extension to reload data. Right click to get a link to yahoo finance directly.
